mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberid, member_password , member_name, member_department, member_position,member_EmploymentDate, member_birth, member_email, email_verifycode, TermsAgreed) VALUES (#{memberid}, #{member_password} ,#{member_name}, #{member_department}, #{member_position}, #{member_EmploymentDate}, #{member_birth}, #{member_email}, #{email_verifycode}, #{TermsAgreed})
mapper.select: SELECT bt_idm AS "btIdm", memberid AS "memberid", member_password AS "memberPassword", member_name AS "memberName", member_department AS "memberDepartment", member_position AS "memberPosition", member_EmploymentDate AS "memberEmploymentDate", member_birth AS "memberBirth", member_email AS "memberEmail", email_verifycode AS "emailVerifyCode", TermsAgreed AS "termsAgreed" FROM member
